items.title: Awesome Laravel Filament Updates on Sep 01, 2024
Awesome Laravel Filament Updates on Aug 31, 2024
items.content_text:
### Development / Quality Check

*   [PHPStan](https://phpstan.org/)
*   [PHPLoc (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phploc)
*   [PHP Insights](https://phpinsights.com/)
*   [Laravel Grumphp (⭐4.2k)](https://github.com/phpro/grumphp)
*   [PHPMD (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/phpmd/phpmd)

### Development / Formatting

*   [PHP prettier (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/prettier/plugin-php)

### Development / Addons

*   [Laravel Pennant](https://laravel.com/docs/10.x/pennant)
*   [Laravel Jetstream](https://jetstream.laravel.com/2.x/introduction.html)
*   [Laravel Error page (⭐538)](https://github.com/spatie/laravel-ignition)
*   [Laravel Telescope](https://laravel.com/docs/11.x/telescope)
*   [Debugbar (⭐18k)](https://github.com/barryvdh/laravel-debugbar)
*   [Laravel Permission](https://spatie.be/docs/laravel-permission/v6/introduction)
*   [Livewire](https://laravel-livewire.com/)
*   [Laravel Security (⭐245)](https://github.com/GrahamCampbell/Laravel-Security)
*   [Laravel Pail - Logs in command line (⭐855)](https://github.com/laravel/pail)

### Development / Eloquent

*   [Laravel Eloquent Belogns To Through (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/staudenmeir/belongs-to-through)
*   [Laravel Eloquent Cross Search (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/protonemedia/laravel-cross-eloquent-search)
*   [Laravel Eloquent Power Joins (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/kirschbaum-development/eloquent-power-joins)

### Development / Generator

*   [Laravel CRUD Generator (⭐317)](https://github.com/misterdebug/crud-generator-laravel)

### Development / Testing

### Development / Design

*   [Admin Dashboard (⭐397)](https://github.com/cruip/laravel-tailwindcss-admin-dashboard-template)

### CMS / Starter Kits

### Filament / Starter Kits

### Filament / Examples

*   [Tools - Announce](https://filamentphp.com/plugins/rupadana-announce)
*   [Layout - Accordion](https://filamentphp.com/plugins/lara-zeus-accordion)

### Orchid / Plugins

*   [Orchid - Rapid Application Development (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/orchidsoftware/platform)
